turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a tall white mocha from Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a Tall white mocha, got it! did you have a location in mind?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would the location on 10 Gurnet Rd, work for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful! okay, for your mocha, did you want whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did the milk have to be substituted at all?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let's see, the mocha can come with white chocolate drizzle, did you want that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Tall white mocha with whip cream, anything else i'm forgetting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. How much will that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem, give me a moment to make sure they received it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
